DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to was to evaluate the anti bacterial efficacy of sustain-release Cetylpyridinium chloride varnish on orthodontic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sustained-Release Cetylpyridinium Chloride Varnish on Streptococcus Mutans and Lactobacillus in Orthodontic Patients
DOC.keyword: Rate of bacterial load in saliva of orthodontic patients
